name: sssync
description: ePlus Smart Sale Sync - sync data to local pc to web and vice verse

scripts.package-win: electron-packager ./ sssync --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --icon=assets/icons/win/icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName="Milestone Innovative Technologies" --version-string.FileDescription="ePlus Smart Sale Database Synchronizer" --version-string.ProductName="ePlus Smart Sale Synchronizer"

author: Milestone Innovative Technologies
